inventory=[{"type": "sand", "quantity": 20, "index": 11}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 50, "index": 12}, {"type": "activator_rail", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 10, "index": 23}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 8, "index": 37}]

thought: To craft purple carpet I need to place 8 white carpets and 1 purple dye on the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move one of the white carpets from slot 37 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 8
